title: Family Video Gallery - SvelteKit + Skeleton UI static site
Initialize SvelteKit project with adapter-static and Skeleton UI
description: Set up SvelteKit with adapter-static for GitHub Pages deployment, install and configure Skeleton UI with Tailwind
close_reason: SvelteKit project initialized with adapter-static, Skeleton UI v4, and Tailwind v4. Build verified.

title: Create videos.json data schema and sample data
description: Define JSON schema for video metadata (id, title, description, thumbnail, publishedAt, playlist, duration, tags). Create sample static/videos.json file

title: Build main gallery page with video grid
description: Create / route that fetches /videos.json at runtime, displays responsive grid of video cards with thumbnails, titles, dates, playlists

title: Implement search and filtering
description: Add free-text search across title/description/tags, playlist facet filters, optional date range filtering. All client-side on JSON data

title: Create VideoCard component
description: Skeleton UI card component showing thumbnail, title, published date, playlist, duration. Click opens YouTube player

title: Build /admin page
description: Admin page with: video list with YouTube Studio edit links (https://studio.youtube.com/video/VIDEO_ID/edit), button to trigger data refresh (Mode A - link to GitHub Actions)

title: Create GitHub Actions build and deploy workflow
description: Workflow triggered on push to main: install deps, npm run build, deploy static site to GitHub Pages

title: Create GitHub Actions refresh-videos workflow
description: Workflow (manual + repository_dispatch): run Node script to call YouTube Data API, filter unlisted videos, generate static/videos.json, commit and push. Requires YOUTUBE_API_KEY and YOUTUBE_CHANNEL_ID secrets

title: Create YouTube API fetch script
description: Node script that calls YouTube Data API to fetch channel videos, filters for unlisted, outputs videos.json format with all metadata fields
